resources.string: Fina a bug? Report it on our bug tracker website
You haven\'t saved any servers yet

To use the app, first you need to go to the Server Status home page.

From there you chose which version of Minecraft that the server is on, either "Java" for Minecraft java edition, or "Bedrock" for any other version of Minecraft.

Once you have chose a version, simply put in the server's ip (and port if you are looking up a bedrock server) and press "Go" to find the status.


If you would like to save a server to look up the status later, please create an account and click "Add to My Servers".

Once you do this, you can go to "My Servers" when you are logged in and you will see any servers that you have saved.

These are a few things to be mindful of when using the app. Please do not contact the developer about these things, as they are already working on fixes for them, or are minor enough to be ignored.


1. A stable internet or wifi connection is required to use this app 

2. Information will not load immediately and will take a few seconds to load

3. Server lookup information will only change once every 10 minutes (this is so that the app and server can keep up with all the other people who also want to check server statuses)

4. Currently the bug report is in beta and is not going to be linked until it has been finished, please hang tight until it is done!
Did you notice a bug with the app, but don\'t know how to effectively fill out a bug report? Here are some steps to follow if you are new to writing bug reports!

Title: briefly specify the problem that you faced

Environment: ask yourself the following question "what kind of device am I using the app on, and what operating system version is the device running?"

Description: give a brief explanation of what the bug does or what is it affecting

Steps to reproduce a Bug: explain the steps leading up to when you experienced the bug or how to trigger the bug again

Expected Result: what you expected to happen when you followed the above steps

Actual Result: what actually happened when you followed the above steps

Visual Proof of Bug: if you have any screenshots, videos, or text related to the bug include them with your report
